Title: Now, authors take the ‘trailer’ route to launch their books
Content: Vasudhendra, writer and publisher in Kannada, released his 5 Paise Varadakshine (a collection of essays) earlier this month — not in an auditorium, but through a two-minute trailer on social media. W
